amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, sought to reduce the intelligence budget by 5 percent from the level authorized for fiscal year 1997 with the CIA Retirement and Disability Fund excepted from the reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of July 8, 1997, as modified, to reduce the authorization in the bill by 5%.

action.text: Sanders amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent. Modification would change the proposed reduction of authorization from 10 to 5%.
On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A004) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 289 (Roll no. 253).
